title: X Square Robot secures $140M in funding for AI foundation models
description:
X Square Robot has raised $140 million to build the WALL-A model for general-purpose robots just four months after raising $100 million.

The post X Square Robot secures $140M in funding for AI foundation models appeared first on The Robot Report.
